english_example_sentence: We, old and tired farmers, have apparently died quietly in this small village.
russian_example_sentence: Мы, старые и уставшие фермеры, по-видимому, тихо умерли в этой маленькой деревне.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz, yaşlı ve yorgun çiftçiler, bu küçük köyde sessizce ölmüşüz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz, yaşlı ve yorgun çiftçiler, bu küçük köyde sessizce ______.
